name: minion
description: This game was made for Bitter Jam. Bitter Jam is a 60 hour long game jam running from May 1st, 2020 to May 4th where all games submitted must only use the tilesheet provided to jammers at the start of the jam.  No other graphics can be used and the current graphics were not able to be modified. The provided sprite sheet of 8x8 characters formed the characters seen in the game.
